<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get Alerts for Resource</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/resource/alert"}></MethodEndpoint>



Get a list of alerts associated with a given resource.  

Only the **rrn** parameter in the request body is used for this API. Ignore the **rrnList**, **timelineItemId**, and 
**findingType** fields for this API.

An example request body is:
```
{
  "rrn": "rrn::storageBucket:us-east-1:123456789012:test-bucket"
}
```
